attributes.action: Confirm The Ownership of Leeds United Football Club
attributes.additional_details: Like many fans and supporters of Leeds United FC, we are concerned at the lack of financial transparency and dealings in particular of the chariman Mr Ken Bates and would like the situation to be investigated and once and for all the true owner(s) identities made public knowledge. Mr Bates has been asked to make this information public, however refuses to do so and continues to remain evasive on the subject. The same applies to all football clubs financial dealings and ownership. Thank you.
